name: Haiku OS R1 Beta 4
install_guide_markdown:
# Haiku OS Installation Guide

Haiku provides a straightforward installer for disk-based installation on compatible hardware.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download Haiku R1 Beta 4 ISO from official download portal.

install_steps.title: Create Installation Media
install_steps.detail_md: Write ISO to USB or CD using any compatible tool.

install_steps.title: Boot from Media
install_steps.detail_md: Restart computer and boot from USB/CD.

install_steps.title: Run Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Choose target disk, format partition, and click Install.

install_steps.title: First Boot and Setup
install_steps.detail_md: Boot into Haiku, run setup wizard, configure network and preferences.

license: MIT and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: Haiku OS is privacy-focused with no external telemetry by design.
